Package Services

Class PlayerService

java.lang.Object
Services.PlayerService
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class PlayerService extends Object implements Serializable
This class is responsible for handling player operations.
Version:
3.0.0
Author:
Sumit Sharma, Muhammad Adnan Asad, Pranaykumar Chauhan, Darshansinh Dilipsinh Devda, Dhruvkumar Parmar, Dhruv Patel

  • Constructor Details

    • PlayerService

      public PlayerService()

  • Method Details

    • isPlayerNameTaken

      public boolean isPlayerNameTaken(List<Player> playersList, String playerName)
      This method check whether the player name exists.
      Parameters:
      playersList - list of already exisitng players.
      playerName - player name we want to add.
      Returns:
      returns true if the player name already exists, otherwise it returns false.

    • updatePlayers

      public void updatePlayers(GameState p_gameState, String p_command, String p_playerName)
      This method is called by the controller to add or remove players and update the game state.
      Parameters:
      p_gameState - The game state to update with player information.
      p_command - The command denoting ("add" or "remove").
      p_playerName - The name of the player to add or remove.

    • allocCountriesAndContinents

      public void allocCountriesAndContinents(GameState p_gameStateInfo)
      Allocate countries and continents to players. This method allocates countries to players based on the number of available players and countries. It also allocates continents to players based on the countries they own.
      Parameters:
      p_gameStateInfo - The game state information containing players, countries, and continents.

    • allocRandomContinents

      public void allocRandomContinents(List<Player> p_playerList, List<Continent> p_continentList)
      Allocates continents to players based on their owned countries. This method iterates through the list of players and checks if a player owns all the countries of a continent. If a player owns all the countries of a continent, that continent is allocated to the player.
      Parameters:
      p_playerList - The list of players in the game.
      p_continentList - The list of continents in the game.

    • arePlayersLoaded

      public boolean arePlayersLoaded(GameState p_gameStateInfo)
      Checks if players have been added to the game.
      Parameters:
      p_gameStateInfo - Current game state information to be checked.
      Returns:
      True if players loaded, false otherwise.

    • isArmyUnallocated

      public boolean isArmyUnallocated(List<Player> p_playersList)
      Checks if there are unallocated armies among a list of players. This method iterates through a list of players and calculates the total number of unallocated armies among them. If the total number of unallocated armies is not equal to zero, it indicates that there are unallocated armies in the game.
      Parameters:
      p_playersList - The list of players to check for unallocated armies.
      Returns:
      true if there are unallocated armies among the players, false otherwise.

    • pendingOrdersExist

      public boolean pendingOrdersExist(List<Player> p_playersList)
      Checks if there are pending orders among a list of players. This method iterates through a list of players and calculates the total number of pending orders among them. If the total number of pending orders is not equal to zero, it indicates that there are pending orders in the game.
      Parameters:
      p_playersList - The list of players to check for pending orders.
      Returns:
      true if there are pending orders among the players, false otherwise.

    • allocColors

      public void allocColors(GameState p_gameStateInfo)
      Allocate different Colors to the players randomly to distinguish them.
      Parameters:
      p_gameStateInfo - Current Game State

    • findArmyCount

      public int findArmyCount(Player p_player)
      Calculates the number of armies to assign to a player based on their owned countries and continents.
      Parameters:
      p_player - The player for whom to calculate armies.
      Returns:
      The calculated number of armies to assign to the player.

    • allocArmies

      public void allocArmies(GameState p_gameStateInfo)
      Allocates armies to players in the game based on their respective territories and continents.
      Parameters:
      p_gameStateInfo - The game state information containing player data and game status.

    • assignrandomstrategy

      public void assignrandomstrategy(String p_enteredPlayerName)
      Assign Random Starategy to the player.
      Parameters:
      p_enteredPlayerName - Given player Name

    • checkAdditionalOrders

      public boolean checkAdditionalOrders(List<Player> p_playersList)
      Checks if any players in the game wish to issue additional orders.
      Parameters:
      p_playersList - players involved in game
      Returns:
      boolean whether there are more orders to give or not

    • resetPlayersFlag

      public void resetPlayersFlag(List<Player> p_playersList)
      Resets each players information for accepting further orders.
      Parameters:
      p_playersList - players involved in game

    • setD_playerLog

      public void setD_playerLog(String p_playerServiceLog)
      Sets the player service log message and prints it to the standard output stream.
      Parameters:
      p_playerServiceLog - The message to be set as the player service log message.

    • getPlayerByName

      public Player getPlayerByName(String p_playerName, GameState p_gameState)
      Retrieves a player from the game state by their player name.

      Searches for a player with the specified player name in the list of players within the given game state.

      Parameters:
      p_playerName - The name of the player to retrieve.
      p_gameState - The current game state containing the player list.
      Returns:
      The player with the matching player name if found; otherwise, null.
